column4: I'm screwed too because I have ATI X1250 on this laptop. After a year of very poor 3d, the open-source radeonhd is better, but the screen seems to jerk downwards randomly and has always done that.
fglrx stopped supporting my card almost instantly because the "open source driver" was free enough. Bah.
i had the same problem with my X1600, they just dropped the support :(
